name: Deimos
description:
> *The bloodstone explosion unearthed a portal to a place where few have beenâ€”and none have escaped. Deconstruct the mysteries and learn the true story of one of history's most misunderstood figures.*

This is a run specifically for the last boss of Bastion of the Penitent (Wing 4), <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**, which is a difficult, punishing boss where any kind of DPS works.

Both power and condi DPS work for this encounter!

<:quick_healer:1176639812900495400> <:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Healer Roles:**
- One healer will need to **Tank**. Tanking for the latter boss is toughness-based, so you're expected to take some toughness via gear such as `Minstrel's` or `Giver's` to take aggro.

ðŸ©¸ **Other Roles:**
- One player will need to play the ðŸ©¸ **Handkiter** role. This requires a specialised build to do the `Hand Kiting` mechanic. It is a role that requires a lot of survivability and I recommend bringing some toughness trinkets.

Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: This template for a <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos** run has a ðŸ©¸ **Handkiter** role and a **Tank** healer special role.
